evolutionmod:Adaptation.NAME: Adaptation
evolutionmod:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The next !M! basic Ï€Strike or Defend you play will Adapt with your next Gene.

evolutionmod:LoyalCompanion.NAME: Loyal Companion
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Randomized Form: gain !M! Dexterity. NL Exhaust. NL The Form is randomized when this card is created.

evolutionmod:LoyalWarrior.NAME: Loyal Warrior
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Randomized Form: gain !M! Strength. NL Exhaust. NL The Form is randomized when this card is created.

evolutionmod:Evolution.NAME: Evolution
evolutionmod:Evolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Evolve !M! randomized when drawn and at the end of your turn. NL Retain.

evolutionmod:AggressiveBlow.NAME: Aggressive Blow
evolutionmod:AggressiveBlow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Centaur, Beast, Harpy trait: gain [E].

evolutionmod:Kick.NAME: Kick
evolutionmod:Kick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Centaur Form: Charge and Strength affect this card !M! times.

evolutionmod:WindUp.NAME: Wind up
evolutionmod:WindUp.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards NL Adapt this with a Centaur gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Stampede.NAME: Stampede
evolutionmod:Stampede.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies twice. NL Evolve a Centaur gene.

evolutionmod:Brambles.NAME: Brambles
evolutionmod:Brambles.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Plant Form: gain !M! Brambles

evolutionmod:VineLash.NAME: Vine lash
evolutionmod:VineLash.DESCRIPTION: Adapt this with a Plant gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times. Deal !D! damage plus your Thorns and Brambles.

evolutionmod:Constrict.NAME: Constrict
evolutionmod:Constrict.DESCRIPTION: Plant Form: apply Constricted equal to your Thorns and Brambles to an enemy.
evolutionmod:Constrict.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Plant Form: apply Constricted equal to your Thorns and Brambles to ALL enemies.

evolutionmod:TalonStrike.NAME: Talon strike
evolutionmod:TalonStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Harpy Form: hits twice.

evolutionmod:TakeOff.NAME: Take Off
evolutionmod:TakeOff.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Draw !M! card. NL Adapt this with a Harpy gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.NAME: Feather Storm
evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each 2 cards in your hand NL Harpy Form: draw a card.
evolutionmod:FeatherStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each 2 cards in your hand NL Harpy Form: draw !M! cards.

evolutionmod:WaterBolt.NAME: Water bolt
evolutionmod:WaterBolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Apply !M! Weak NL Evolve a Merfolk gene

evolutionmod:WaveCrash.NAME: Wave Crash
evolutionmod:WaveCrash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Evolve a Merfolk gene

evolutionmod:Dive.NAME: Dive
evolutionmod:Dive.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL Merfolk Form: Refund up to 1 [E].

evolutionmod:Drown.NAME: Drown
evolutionmod:Drown.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block NL At the end of this turn the enemy will take your block as damage NL Evolve a Merfolk gene

evolutionmod:Charm.NAME: Charm
evolutionmod:Charm.DESCRIPTION: The enemy loses !M! Strength this turn. NL Succubus Form: gain 1 Potency until your next turn

evolutionmod:Strip.NAME: Strip
evolutionmod:Strip.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Block from the enemy. NL Succubus Form: apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.
evolutionmod:Strip.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL Block from the enemy. NL Succubus Form: apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies and Exhaust.

evolutionmod:Seduce.NAME: Seduce
evolutionmod:Seduce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage NL Give yourself and the enemy Block equal to the unblocked damage NL Succubus Form: Refund 1.

evolutionmod:FlameStrike.NAME: Flame Strike
evolutionmod:FlameStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Lavafolk Form: gain 1 Potency until your next turn.

evolutionmod:ChannelMagic.NAME: Channel magic
evolutionmod:ChannelMagic.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Potency until your next turn. NL Lavafolk, Lymean, Insect trait: gain !M! more.

evolutionmod:Eruption.NAME: Eruption
evolutionmod:Eruption.DESCRIPTION: Lavafolk trait: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies and channel !M! Lavafolk genes.

evolutionmod:DrainMana.NAME: Drain Mana
evolutionmod:DrainMana.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards NL Lymean Form: Scry 3.

evolutionmod:Purify.NAME: Purify
evolutionmod:Purify.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust up to !M! cards. NL Adapt this with a Lymean gene up to !evolutionmod:MA! times.

evolutionmod:Aegis.NAME: Aegis
evolutionmod:Aegis.DESCRIPTION: Apply Intangible to EVERYONE. NL When you play an attack Exhaust Aegis from your hand.
evolutionmod:Aegis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply Intangible to EVERYONE. NL When you play an attack Exhaust Aegis from your hand. NL Lymean Form: Gain !B! Block.

evolutionmod:GatherFood.NAME: Gather Food
evolutionmod:GatherFood.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Drone to your hand. NL Evolve an Insect gene.

evolutionmod:Hatch.NAME: Hatch
evolutionmod:Hatch.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! Drones to your hand. NL Insect Form: gain 1 Potency this turn.

evolutionmod:Incubate.NAME: Incubate
evolutionmod:Incubate.DESCRIPTION: Your next !M! Drones will be upgraded. NL Evolve an Insect gene.

evolutionmod:ClawSlash.NAME: Claw slash
evolutionmod:ClawSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Beast Form: Refund 1.

evolutionmod:Shadowbolt.NAME: Shadowbolt
evolutionmod:Shadowbolt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply !M! Weak. NL Shadow Form: add damage equal to the initial Weak of the target.

evolutionmod:HeightenedSenses.NAME: Heightened senses
evolutionmod:HeightenedSenses.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Discard ALL cards drawn this way which are not Attacks. NL Beast Form: Adapt this with a Beast gene.

evolutionmod:Rush.NAME: Rush
evolutionmod:Rush.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play a random Strike from your deck on the same target. NL Evolve a Beast gene.
evolutionmod:Rush.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a random Strike from your deck and play a copy on the same target. NL Evolve a Beast gene.

evolutionmod:Regenerate.NAME: Regenerate
evolutionmod:Regenerate.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a random Status. NL Evolve a Lizard gene.

evolutionmod:PoisonFangs.NAME: Poison Fangs
evolutionmod:PoisonFangs.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lizard Form: Apply !M! Poison.

evolutionmod:PoisonSpit.NAME: Poison Spit
evolutionmod:PoisonSpit.DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage this turn, apply !M! Poison. NL Lizard Form: apply 1 more.
evolutionmod:PoisonSpit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever an Attack deals unblocked damage this turn, apply !M! Poison. NL Evolve a Lizard gene.

evolutionmod:ShadowShift.NAME: Shadow Shift
evolutionmod:ShadowShift.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. NL Gain !B! Block for each card discarded. NL Evolve a Ghost gene.

evolutionmod:CursedTouch.NAME: Cursed Touch
evolutionmod:CursedTouch.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Weak. NL Shadow Form: Adapt this with a Shadow gene.

evolutionmod:DrainCurse.NAME: Drain Curse
evolutionmod:DrainCurse.DESCRIPTION: Remove ALL but 1 Weak from the enemy. NL Gain !M! times that much Block (total: !evolutionmod:DrainCurseAmount!). NL Evolve a Ghost gene.

evolutionmod:SirenSong.NAME: Siren Song
evolutionmod:SirenSong.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block for each enemy intending to attack. NL Channel a Merfolk gene.

evolutionmod:BlackCat.NAME: Black Cat
evolutionmod:BlackCat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Beast Form: hits twice. NL Shadow Form: Apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:Toxin.NAME: Toxin
evolutionmod:Toxin.DESCRIPTION: Plant Form: NL Lizard Form: NL Apply Poison to the enemy equal to !M! % of its maxumum health and Exhaust.

evolutionmod:ThickHide.NAME: Thick Hide
evolutionmod:ThickHide.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated armor. NL Beast Form: NL Centaur Form: gain 1 Plated armor.
evolutionmod:ThickHide.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Plated armor. NL Beast Form: channel a Centaur gene.

evolutionmod:Strenghten.NAME: Strenghten
evolutionmod:Strenghten.DESCRIPTION: The first attack you play each deals 50% more damage. Affects !M! attacks. NL Lymean Form: Channel a Centaur gene.

evolutionmod:Firebloom.NAME: Firebloom
evolutionmod:Firebloom.DESCRIPTION: Channel a Lavafolk gene. NL Plant Form: Channel a Lavafolk gene.
evolutionmod:Firebloom.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Channel !M! Lavafolk genes. NL Plant Form: Channel a Lavafolk gene.

evolutionmod:Phoenix.NAME: Phoenix
evolutionmod:Phoenix.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Harpy Form: Adapt with your Lavafolk genes.
evolutionmod:Phoenix.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Channel a Lavafolk gene. NL Harpy Form: Adapt with your Lavafolk genes.

evolutionmod:Salamander.NAME: Salamander
evolutionmod:Salamander.DESCRIPTION: Heal !M! HP. NL Evolve a Lavafolk gene and a Lizard gene.

evolutionmod:Blessing.NAME: Blessing
evolutionmod:Blessing.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random Curse from your deck. NL Gain !M! Artifact NL Evolve a Lymean gene and a Shadow gene.
evolutionmod:Blessing.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Exhaust a random Curse from your deck. NL Gain !M! Artifact NL Evolve a Lymean gene and a Ghost gene.

evolutionmod:Symbiotes.NAME: Symbiotes
evolutionmod:Symbiotes.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Brambles and twice as much Block the first time you play a Drone each turn. NL Insect Form: Plant Form: Refund 1.

evolutionmod:HardWorker.NAME: Hard Worker
evolutionmod:HardWorker.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Centaur Form: gain 1 Strength.
evolutionmod:HardWorker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Centaur Form: gain 1 Strength. NL Insect Form: gain 1 Strength.

evolutionmod:CurrentsDancer.NAME: Currents Dancer
evolutionmod:CurrentsDancer.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Harpy Form: gain 1 Dexterity.
evolutionmod:CurrentsDancer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Dexterity. NL Harpy Form: gain 1 Dexterity. NL Merfolk Form: gain 1 Dexterity.

evolutionmod:SpiderBite.NAME: Spider Bite
evolutionmod:SpiderBite.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Insect Form: apply 3(4) Poison for each drone in your hand and Exhaust them.

evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.NAME: Shifting strike
evolutionmod:ShiftingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Trigger your first !M! genes.

evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.NAME: Shifting guard
evolutionmod:ShiftingGuard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Trigger your first !M! genes.

evolutionmod:ChimeraStrike.NAME: Chimera Strike
evolutionmod:ChimeraStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Adapt with your oldest gene.

evolutionmod:ChimeraDefense.NAME: Chimera Defense
evolutionmod:ChimeraDefense.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! block. NL Adapt with your oldest gene.

evolutionmod:CrystalShard.NAME: Crystal Shard
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Randomized Form: add !M! damage. NL Randomized Form: draw a card. NL Exhaust. NL The Forms are randomized when this card is created.
Form: draw a card. NL Exhaust.

evolutionmod:CrystalBlock.NAME: Crystal Block
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Randomized Form: add !M! Block. NL Randomized Form: refund 1 energy. NL Exhaust. NL The Forms are randomized when this card is created.

evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.NAME: Shifting power
evolutionmod:ShiftingPower.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. NL Trigger your first !M! genes.

evolutionmod:GodForm.NAME: GodForm
evolutionmod:GodForm.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effect of your genes and adaptations by !M!.

evolutionmod:DarkDesires.NAME: Dark Desires
evolutionmod:DarkDesires.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy deal !M! damage to it. Succubus Form: channel a Shadow gene.

evolutionmod:AquaticForm.NAME: Aquatic Form
evolutionmod:AquaticForm.DESCRIPTION: Increase the Block and Poison of Merfolk and Lizard Genes by !M!

evolutionmod:HardWorker.NAME: Magic Form
evolutionmod:HardWorker.DESCRIPTION: Increase the damage and Block of Lavafolk and Lymean Genes by !M!

evolutionmod:Drone.NAME: Drone
evolutionmod:Drone.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL Gains Block and damage from Potency NL Exhaust. Ethereal.

evolutionmod:Offbeat.NAME: Offbeat
evolutionmod:Offbeat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Tempo !melodyMod:T!: hits twice

mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.NAME: Closing Barrage
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise multiplied by !M!.
mysticmodref:ClosingBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deals Y damage X+1 times, where Y is equal to your total [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise multiplied by !M!.

mysticmodref:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
mysticmodref:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Costs [E] less for each stack of [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise. Deal !D! damage twice, then double the [#5299DC]Power and [#FF5252]Poise amounts.
